headline: BOSTON PIZZA PARTNERS WITH LIVE NATION CANADA TO BRING LIVE MUSIC AND EPIC PRIZES TO CANADIANS
summary: This summer, Boston Pizza is dialing up the energy coast-to-coast-to-coast with a new multi-year partnership with Live Nation Canada. From June 25th onwards, guests who dine at Boston Pizza can scan a QR code in-restaurant and enter their receipt info for a chance to win tickets to some of the hottest shows of the summer.

thumbnail.caption: This partnership and summer-long celebration also marks the launch of Boston Pizzaâ€™s broader brand refresh - a new era focused on connecting with a younger, more social generation. (CNW Group/Boston Pizza International Inc.)
